imdb.title: Fushigi Yûgi
imdb.plot: A girl named Miaka Yuuki and her friend Yui Hongo are taken into the book called The Universe of the Four Gods. There they battle many hardships including each other in order to become the priestess of Suzaku and Seiryuu and summo...

episodes.title: Enchantment's Quickening
episodes.plot: Miaka's mysterious new classmate, Shigyou, creates chaos for her and Taka. Suzaku pulls Miaka and Taka back into the book. Chichiri gives Taka an orb, returning memories of being Tamahome. Shigyou's powers bleed into both worlds.

episodes.title: Child of Silence
episodes.plot: Miaka and the Celestial Warriors must find memory orbs and return them to Taka before he disappears forever. Shigyou reveals himself as a demon. Hotohori meets his son and an orb is found. Suzaku returns Miaka and Taka to the real world.

episodes.title: Manifestation of Rebirth
episodes.plot: Yui tells Miaka and Taka about the demon. A new demon attacks Taka. Taka and Miaka return to the scroll world and meet Nuriko's brother. Miaka saves Taka and the Warriors defeat the demon's creature. Another orb is found.

episodes.title: The Flame of Friendship
episodes.plot: Taka and Miaka are captured by Tenkou who then kills Miisu and Renhou and steals Taka's memories. A new demon attacks Tasuki, controlling him to take advantage of Miaka.Tasuki saves himself but Miaka is then kidnapped by the demon.

episodes.title: The Transience of a Water Mirror
episodes.plot: Chichiri discovers the new demon, Hikou, is connected to his past. Hikou uses Miaka to attack Yui in the real world from within the scroll. The Warriors defeat Hikou together. A new demon, Yousue, attacks the Celestial Warriors. Tamahome appears.

episodes.title: To Be with You Tomorrow
episodes.plot: Taka's situation worsens as does the destruction in the real world. Tamahome was sent by Suzaku to aide in the fight against Tenkou. Taka finally understands his purpose as he connects with Tamahome and Tenkou is defeated.

episodes.title: Lost Ties
episodes.plot: Tamahome is pulled back into the Universe of the Four Gods. Fifty years have passed and he's horrified when a woman approaches him and calls him Nakago. In the real world, the book is missing and Yui has a frightening vision.

episodes.title: Sorrowful Flash
episodes.plot: Nakago has taken over Tamahome's body. Tomo is behind the strange events. Yui is pulled into the book. Chichiri and Tasuki meet with Suboshi, using Amiboshi's body. Yui becomes Genbu no Miko. Nakago appears and Miaka enters the book.

episodes.title: Parting... And Then
episodes.plot: Yui and Tamahome break free of their spells as the Suzaku Celestial Warriors return. Suboshi/Amiboshi dies protecting Yui. Tenkou is sealed by Yui. The girls go back. Taiitsukun tells Tamahome he must find seven globes to return to Miaka.

episodes.title: Star Festival
episodes.plot: Miaki and the Suzaku Seven prepare for a long journey.

episodes.title: Tombstone Oath
episodes.plot: Amiboshi's twin, Suboshi, is out for vengeance over Amiboshi's murder. But Tamahome is equally enraged, and they battle it out. Devastated by what happened to Tamahome's family, Miaka pledges her allegiance in the fight against Seiryu.

episodes.title: The Ancient Path
episodes.plot: Miaka reflects on the journey that has led her to Hokkan.

episodes.title: Mysteries Afoot
episodes.plot: Back on Earth, Miaka's brother Keisuke is busy studying the history of the Universe of the Four Gods. When he finds out what the people who wrote the book actually intended, he shares it with Miaka, who now must make a serious decision.

episodes.title: The Flash of Battle
episodes.plot: Miaka, Nuriko, and Tamahome are left shipwrecked after a lighting strike, and they seek shelter in an abandoned cave. When they are rescued, they finally land in Hokkan, the land of Genbu, where the Shinzaho is located.

episodes.title: Whirlpool of Doubt
episodes.plot: Miaka and the Warriors arrive in the city of Touran in search of the Shinzaho, where they learn the history of the Shinzaho, and the Genbu Seven. Miaka, though, has other things on her mind: like whether to stay or go...

episodes.title: To Die for the Star of Suzaku
episodes.plot: While Nuriko fights off the beast Ashitare, Tamahome confronts Yui to convince her to stop summoning Seiryu. Later, Nuriko consoles Tamahome before making a shocking admission...

episodes.title: Nuriko, the Eternal Farewell
episodes.plot: Nuriko steps into the Shinzaho.

episodes.title: Guardians of Ice
episodes.plot: Inside the cave of the Shinzaho, the Suzaku Warriors are confronted by Tomite and Hikitsu, two ancient ghosts of the Genbu Warriors.To prove herself worthy, Miaka must endure an icy challenge, and it could leave her literally frozen solid.

episodes.title: Hell's Mirage
episodes.plot: Upon leaving the cave, the Shinzaho is snatched from Miaka by Ashitare's wolf form. Hoping to get it back, Taiitsukun suggests to Miaka a rather risquė proposition.

episodes.title: Trampled Love
episodes.plot: Tamahome is on a race to rescue Miaka.

episodes.title: Bewitched Warmth
episodes.plot: Miaka faces some questions of the heart.

episodes.title: Dawn of the Heart
episodes.plot: Miaka must face the pain within her.

episodes.title: Bewitched Illusions
episodes.plot: Miaka and Tamahome are only briefly reunited before the illusionist Tomo of the Seiryu Warriors attacks. Tamahome is stabbed and dragged off a cliff, while Miaka is trapped in a strange (and not entirely unpleasant) dream.

episodes.title: Deceptive Love
episodes.plot: Miaka must make a decision between comfort and true love.

episodes.title: Sunlight of Rebirth
episodes.plot: Miaka and the Suzaku Warriors reflect following a victory.

episodes.title: Unbreachable Wall
episodes.plot: With Tamahome and Miaka at a crossroads, and their destiny apparently sealed, love seems impossible. Meanwhile, the Seiryu Warriors get their hands on the second Shinzaho-the Shinzaho of Byakko.

episodes.title: Farewell Reunion
episodes.plot: Freed from their cell by a remorseful Yui, Miaka and Tatara of the Byakko Seven have a heart to heart, where Tatara reveals not only the second Shinzaho, but also what destiny has in store for Miaka and Tamahome...

episodes.title: Moment of Battle
episodes.plot: The Suzaku Seven are put in a compromising position after Chiriko becomes possessed by Miboshi, Subaru and Tokaki of the Byakko Seven became teenagers again, and Yui prepares to summon Seiryu.

episodes.title: Divergent Light
episodes.plot: Yui succeeds in summoning Seiryu and makes her first wish. Miaka and the Suzaku Seven meet Hotohori's new empress, and Keisuke and Tetsuya learn the origin of Genbu Grotto.

episodes.title: Repose of the Soul's Light
episodes.plot: Tamahome explores the meaning of it all.

episodes.title: Wedding Celebration
episodes.plot: Miaka is finally free to reveal Nakago's deceitful ways to Yui, just as Nakago appears before them. Later, Miaka begs Tamahome not to leave-and Tamahome proposes a wedding ceremony!

episodes.title: Atonement
episodes.plot: Back on Earth, Tamahome is pummeled by Nakago. Nakago then attacks Miaka and threatens her life if Yui does not grant his wish for immortality. But Yui has her own plans for her last wish....

episodes.title: Entrusted Hope
episodes.plot: Miaka summons a powerful beast-god.

episodes.title: For My Loved One
episodes.plot: The Suzaku Seven and the Princess square off with Nagako.

episodes.title: The Girl of Legend
episodes.plot: Bored with her studies, Miaka Yuki finds an old book that will change her life forever.

episodes.title: Priestess of Suzaku
episodes.plot: Miaka's meeting with the Emperor of Konan begins a journey.

episodes.title: The Seven Stars of Suzaku
episodes.plot: After Hotohori explains to Miaka the legend of Suzaku, the finest warriors in the kingdom are gathered together, and Miaka tries to provoke them ... with disastrous results.

episodes.title: Missing Love
episodes.plot: After a lakeside conversation (and an impromptu swim), Miaka learns Nuriko's true feelings, and later, Hotohori's. But what about Tamahome? He's still a mystery to her and it's driving her crazy.

episodes.title: Bewildered Heartbeat
episodes.plot: The Celestial Warriors join Miaka on a trek to a mountain retreat to find Taiitsukun-an entity rumored to control the entire Universe, in the hope of helping her return to her own world.

episodes.title: Even If I Die...
episodes.plot: Miaka is two-faced-quite literally-after becoming trapped inside a mirror. And when her shadow self manages to escape, her own friends become her first target!

episodes.title: Brief Parting
episodes.plot: After Miaka manages to find her way back home, she also finds herself at a loss for what to do ... and where she belongs. Not only that, but now Yui has inexplicably disappeared.

episodes.title: Enemies Unseen
episodes.plot: An assassin is after Miaka.

episodes.title: Looking for Yui
episodes.plot: Miaka travels to Kuto looking for Yui, after getting some disturbing advice from Chichiri. Tamahome, meanwhile, is back at home licking his wounds.

episodes.title: Priestess of Seiryuu
episodes.plot: Miaka is the Priestess of Suzaku, but it turns out that Yui has been keeping her own secrets-and this one is especially huge. With the two of them sharing so much in common, can their friendship survive?

episodes.title: Only You
episodes.plot: With Yui still raging, Miaka turns her attention to the reformation of the Suzaku Seven ... and to winning Tamahome back.

episodes.title: For the Sake of Love
episodes.plot: Tamahome makes a dangerous sacrifice for Miaka.

episodes.title: Wolf in the Fortress
episodes.plot: As Miaka narrows her search for the fifth Celestial Warrior (among a group of bandits, where she is nearly raped), she is kidnapped by a wolf-like man who claims to be the rightful leader of the bandits.

episodes.title: The City of Resurrection
episodes.plot: After learning that Tasuki may be dead, Miaka searches for a healer rumored to bring the dead back to life. But when she herself falls victim to a brutal illness, Miaka must first die in order to be healed.

episodes.title: Battle of Sorrow
episodes.plot: Hotohori brings Miaka's plight to doctor Juan Myō, where he learns the truth about Shoka. Later, after Miaka sprouts a sickness demon from her back, the sixth of the Suzaku Seven appears-and it's quite a surprise.

episodes.title: Magic Flute
episodes.plot: Miaka finds the final member of the Suzaku Seven.

episodes.title: Love Trap
episodes.plot: Miaka and Tamahome make a promise to reunite, but Yui still stands between them. Later, Nuriko gives her a special doll rumored to makes a couple's love eternal, but when it breaks, what does it mean?!!!

episodes.title: Unreachable Hope
episodes.plot: Miaka must say a hard goodbye.

episodes.title: To Protect You
episodes.plot: While Miaka endures the pain of her broken heart, hoping to put her love for Tamahome behind her, Hotohori offers a comforting shoulder. But Tamahome isn't exactly out of the picture...

episodes.title: I'll Never Leave You
episodes.plot: Tamahome and Hotohori go into a clash.

episodes.title: Shadow of Intrigue
episodes.plot: Now that Tamahome is more or less normal, preparations to summon Suzaku are in full swing, and Nakago's trap is completely off their radar. A disaster is heading for the Suzaku Seven...

episodes.title: Resolution
episodes.plot: The ceremony to summon Suzaku begins with Miaka making her 3 wishes. When nothing appears, and Chiriko starts playing the flute-everyone falls to their knees in agony, and Nakago's plans to disrupt the ceremony become painfully clear.

episodes.title: Love and Sorrow
episodes.plot: Taiitsukun tells Miaka to let go of her love for Tamahome in order to summon Suzaku. Naturally, she's heartbroken. But when Tamahome proposes to Miaka, she seeks trusted advice from Chichiri...
